results.name: a(n) = (-1)^(n mod 3).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = b(2*n + 1) where b() is multiplicative with b(2^e) = 0^e, b(3^e) = -1 if e>0, otherwise b(p^e) = 1.
a(n) = a(-1-n) = a(n+3) = -a(n-1)*a(n-2) for all n in Z.
Given g.f. A(x), then x*A(x^2) = Sum_{k>0} (x^k - x^(2*k)) - 2*(x^(3*k) - x^(6*k)).
a(n) = A131561(n+1) for all n in Z.
a(n) = (-1)^n * A130151(n) for all n in Z.
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A, p, e); n = abs(2*n + 1); A = factor(n); prod( k=1, matsize(A)[1], [p, e] = A[k,]; if( p==2, 0, p==3, -1, 1))};
(MAGMA) [(-1)^(n mod 3) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 02 2016
